PageTitle: reset mpls te auto-bandwidth adjustment timers
FuncDef: The reset mpls te auto-bandwidth adjustment timers command resets the automatic bandwidth adjustment timer after automatic bandwidth adjustment is enabled.
CLIs: reset mpls te auto-bandwidth adjustment timers
Examples: <HUAWEI> reset mpls te auto-bandwidth adjustment timers
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After automatic bandwidth adjustment is enabled and operates for a period, if the existing information needs to be cleared to start collecting new information, run the reset mpls te auto-bandwidth adjustment timers command in the user view. You do not need to delete the automatic bandwidth adjustment configuration and reconfigure it.
